project: Call Center Intelligence - Twitter UI Redesign

userStories.title: Add Twitter color palette to globals.css
userStories.description: Add Twitter color palette as CSS custom properties and engagement animations
acceptanceCriteria: Heart pulse animation for like action

userStories.title: Create Avatar component
userStories.description: Create reusable Avatar component with icon and image variants
acceptanceCriteria: Icon avatar variant (for system cards with alert type icons)
User avatar variant (image or initials fallback)

userStories.title: Create EngagementBar component
